title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
created_time: April 06, 2023, 04:29:08 AMLast edit: April 14, 2023, 05:38:44 PM by MoparMiningLLC
content: A while ago, I was asked to do a group buy for these chips shown by Mow on twitter.Pricing is as follows: Single Chip: $5Single Chip with box: $10Signature Set: $6525 chip set: $150 50 Capsule set: $25050 chip set come in air-tites and in a case like shown below.These are @Liquid_BTC liquid tether 1 L-USDt and the private key is under the tamper evident sticker. You can peel the hologram and sweep the 1 L-USDt into @AquaBitcoin liquid wallet or other liquid wallet.excluding the signature set as it contains one of each denomination, the other options are available in each of the various denominations.COLOR - Denominationwhite 1 USDtred 5 USDtblue 10 USDtgreen 25 USDtBlack 100 USDtPurple 500 USDtall chips are the same price.CHIPS ARE NOT LOADEDI also am doing a group buy for the Mow Satscard made by Coinkite. $15 eachPlease leave your order as follows:qty - option - denomination 1 - Single Chip, 5 USDt1 - Single Chip, 100 USDt2 - Single Chip with box, 10 USDt1 - Signature Set1 - 25 box - 25 USDt1 - SatscardPayment accepted BTCAddress: bc1qn37ly2yjla0thlnfsverzezrvxtxdsyvecp4esPlease dm or poat txn id

comments.author: tweetious
comments.created_time: April 06, 2023, 04:55:06 AMLast edit: April 06, 2023, 06:23:46 AM by tweetious
comments.body: Are those 1 USDt denomination chips pre-loaded with 1 L-USDt ? If yes, what is the pre-loaded status of the chips included in the Signature Set? (since the chips included are of different denominations, I was wondering if none/some of those are pre-loaded with L-USDt )I am aware that you are not the maker of those chips, however, I was wondering if you know this info, or if you would be kind enough to ask the maker.Regardless.... THANK YOU for another awesome group buy !!!I will place my order shortly -just wanted to know the loading status beforehand, to determine ordering quantities-  Edit: (with moar questions ) Does the "25 chip set" comes in a box -as in the photo- without capsules, and the "50 Capsule set" without a box but in plastic capsules?Are there limited quantities reserved for this group buy, or all orders placed till the deadline will be fulfilled?

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.body: Along with Tweets ^ questions, just curious if you know mintages? Appreciate you doing this. (Can put me down for a signature set please)

comments.author: SatsLife
comments.body: Signature set cannot possibly be loaded based on the denominations unless funding is needed on top of purchase price.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.created_time: April 06, 2023, 03:58:56 PMLast edit: April 06, 2023, 05:31:01 PM by MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: I was told they were not loaded months ago but as that was months ago - I am re-asking for confirmation that none of the options include loaded chips.I will ask about mintage. edit: confirmed - chips are not loaded for any of the options.

comments.author: tweetious

comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on April 06, 2023, 03:58:56 PMI was told they were not loaded months ago but as that was months ago - I am re-asking for confirmation that none of the options include loaded chips.I will ask about mintage. edit: confirmed - chips are not loaded for any of the options.Thank you!Since I am on the fence about getting either x amount of single chips OR a box, could you also please elaborate on the "25 chip set: $150 or 50 Capsule set: $250 (2 x the image below)" ?"25 chip set" & "50 Capsule set" is either 1 or 2 of the exact same boxe(s) -as shown in the  photo-, or is there any other differentiation? (ie. the 50 set comes with capsules)Further, acquiring 25 single chips would be $25 cheaper than getting a "25 chip set". Is this an extra charge for the box provided?

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: they just told me it is also possible to get any of the selections in various denominations:white 1 USDtred 5 USDtblue 10 USDtgreen 25 USDtBlack 100 USDtPurple 500 USDtall chips are the same price. Updating OP to show this.as to the mintage, they manufacture the chips locally based on orders so there is a turnaround of 1-2 weeks per order - ie there is no hard cap set on the mintage.Quote from: tweetious on April 06, 2023, 06:15:58 PMQuote from: MoparMiningLLC on April 06, 2023, 03:58:56 PMI was told they were not loaded months ago but as that was months ago - I am re-asking for confirmation that none of the options include loaded chips.I will ask about mintage. edit: confirmed - chips are not loaded for any of the options.Thank you!Since I am on the fence about getting either x amount of single chips OR a box, could you also please elaborate on the "25 chip set: $150 or 50 Capsule set: $250 (2 x the image below)" ?"25 chip set" & "50 Capsule set" is either 1 or 2 of the exact same boxe(s) -as shown in the  photo-, or is there any other differentiation? (ie. the 50 set comes with capsules)Further, acquiring 25 single chips would be $25 cheaper than getting a "25 chip set". Is this an extra charge for the box provided?the boxes of 25 and 50 are boxes of chips of the same denomination.
